title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1121/93 of 7 May 1993 on the definitive application of the guarantee limitation arrangements for sheepmeat and goatmeat for the 1992 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1121/93 of 7 May 1993 on the definitive application of the guarantee limitation arrangements for sheepmeat and goatmeat for the 1992 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Pursuant to the second indent of Article 8 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 3013/89, the final coefficient for the 1992 marketing year shall be fixed at 7 %.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 May 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 289, 7. 10. 1989, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 42, 19. 2. 1993, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 122, 12. 5. 1988, p. 69.
(4) OJ No L 185, 3. 7. 1992, p. 21.
(5) OJ No L 81, 27. 3. 1982, p. 35.
(6) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1987, p. 1.
